cyclone.name: SALLY
cyclone.current_location: about 75 mi south of Mobile, Alabama
cyclone.trajectory: Slowly north, then turning northeast across Alabama and Georgia—away from South Florida
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: north-central Gulf Coast near the AL/FL border (Pensacola–Mobile area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm-surge and tropical storm watches confined to the north-central Gulf Coast; none for South Florida
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane warning Bay St. Louis MS to Navarre FL; Tropical-storm warning Navarre FL to Indian Pass FL and Grand Isle LA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Louisiana, Mississippi, Alabama, and Florida Panhandle coasts
weather_observation.wind: Occasional breezy conditions; sustained winds expected to remain below gale force.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along southeast Florida coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Only scattered showers; heavy rain not anticipated.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated rip currents and rough surf along Atlantic beaches.
